title: Why Do 50 Percent of Steroid Suspensions Come From Dominican Republic?
description: Around 50 percent of baseballâ€™s positive drug tests come from Dominican players. From Jenrry Mejia and Fernando Tatis Jr. to minor leaguers and teenagers, the problems permeate all levels.
dc:creator: James Wagner
media:credit: Sebastian Castrodad for The New York Times
media:description: Jenrry Mejia received three steroid suspensions in his time with the Mets. Still trying to make his way back to the majors, he talks to young Dominican players about the dangers of drug use.
